column4: HELP!  something very weird just happened to my filesystem ... my 500 GB drive suddenly became full and no matter what I delete it stills shows 0 bytes available. cannot even get my email  ...  anyone have an idea what I can do?
boot to live CD if the drive is your linux drive and fsck it
action:  have done an fsck on HD ... no luck
not really great, try some extra options
did yo uby any chance stop a backup halfway?
like I said, poor fsck options, hence liveCD so the drive isnt mounted (you may have to manipulate swap so its not in use)
actionparsnip: was not doing a backup, but had installed some software that crashed
cleans out the old deb files from cache that you ave installed with and no longer need, then makes sure all apps are satisfied for deps
